content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings Max Müller. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Duisburg, let me start with a slightly higher proposal than what you may have expected, setting the foundation for subsequent negotiation. I suggest a monthly rent of 1150 Euros.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing your initial proposal. I don't want to continue the negotiation at this moment because I believe the rent could be lower, taking into account the apartment's location in the city center and its recent construction. Let's find a more reasonable price for both parties.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation at this moment but will keep your feedback in mind. When we resume discussions, I'll be cautious of your perspective on the location and construction while still aiming to secure a profitable rent.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
